Name: Shiki
Review Text: Absolutely delicious food and super lovely people in the kitchen and service. The food was indescribably delicious, such a good Japanese restaurant we have not yet discovered in Germany. ‚Ä¶

Name: Shiki
Review Text: Amazing gem in the center of town. Don't believe the bad reviews, most of them are ancient anyways. Fresh food, very affordable and friendly staff. This place is amazing.

Name: Shiki
Review Text:
One of the best Ramen I ever ate in Europe.
Good food, nice service, cozy place. Luv it.

Name: Shiki
Review Text: The price of food is quite cheap when compare to other Asian restaurants nearby. It may not be the real Japanese food or very delicious but for me the taste is acceptable and I like it. ‚Ä¶

Name: Shiki
Review Text: Amazing place...very nice staff, fast and good food!

Name: Shiki
Review Text: Best and authentic! Having lived in Japan and other areas of the Pacific Realm, finally we find this little place. Highly recommend!

Name: Shiki
Review Text:
Small but comfy.
According to my girl, the best soup ever!
Not expensive but delicious.

Name: Shiki
Review Text: Run from this place if you want to eat good Japanese food and if you are hungry. Gyoza were still quite raw, vegetables were not tasting fresh and the chicken, i did not eat it because i was too scared to be sick. The last thing drinking a can from a straw, never did that in a restaurant yet.

Name: Shiki
Review Text: For this price, I genuinely think it is such a nice small restaurant! You definitely cannot complain.

Name: Shiki
Review Text: To a Taiwanese that has lot of experience in Japanese food, I will sincerely recommend this restaurant to any Japanese or Taiwanese that miss your home dish. Because it tastes exactly what I have in Taiwan and Japan! And the service is also nice and quick. Cash only.

Name: Shiki
Review Text: Affordable restaurant, though the service isn't the greatest It does taste a bit bland initially then some Tabasco sauce helped it spice up. Its pretty much handy at times being located in the heart of the city.

Name: Shiki
Review Text: Good ramen and interisting rice tea! My friend had the fried rice , also very delicious. Perfect place if you want to stay in the centrum of Amsterdam but still want some good food and a comfy place to eat

Name: Shiki
Review Text: It was terrible. If you can see the image, we left the food after taking a bite from each of our dishes. Ramen sucked and tasted stale. Fried rice was bad with chalky rice and the dim sums were tough as rubber. We had to spit it out and ‚Ä¶

Name: Shiki
Review Text:
The waitress initially appeared quite uninterested about our order and was more exercised by a random visitor who came in to use their toilet.
When we eventually ordered two noodle soups, we were pleasantly surprised. ‚Ä¶

Name: Shiki

Name: Shiki
Review Text:

This family run business is serious about their great sushi, and I always find myself returning for more.

Name: Shiki

Name: Shiki
Review Text: In this small alley is this small japanese restaurant with a few seats inside. Delicious terriyaki.

Name: Shiki
Review Text: The best ramen I've ever had.

Name: Shiki

Name: Shiki
Review Text: It is a very small restaurant. When you come in the staff is friendly, but there lacks a warm atmosphere. I often eat alone when I have a long, late night at work. Of the two times ate here the place was almost empty and I got a really ‚Ä¶

Name: Shiki
Review Text: Good japanese food at a decent price. I had the fried noodles with chicken and my wife had the sushi. The only downside is that you cant pay by credit card there so we had to go and withdraw money. Being from Sweden we arent used to this method.

Name: Shiki
Review Text: This is one of the worst so-called Japanese restaurants I've ever been to. The ingredients in the soup were very cheap and lazily prepared. The gyozas had a terrible texture. The rice was just a mediocre plate of sadness. Save your money and don't eat here.

Name: Shiki
Review Text: Went here after a tiring walk exploring De Wallen, and the teriyaki chicken was absolutely amazing. The sauce was perfect and the chicken was cooked amazingly. 11/10

Name: Shiki
Review Text: I came here alone for lunch last week and ordered a pork ramen soup. I was served beef and the soup was disgusting, unable to eat it, and after a debate about the "mystery meat" with the rude waitress, I refused to pay full price but ‚Ä¶

Name: Shiki
Review Text:
Do not reccomend to order any food ,why?
Because food being prepared by "chef" microwave, it's not fresh. good place ONLY for coffee because its quiet that's why 2 stars.

Name: Shiki
Review Text: Excellent food, great prices!

Name: Shiki
Review Text: The service was spot on. The lady was very attentive. The food was amazing. The beer was cold. Food came quickly and was hot and delish. My first japanese food experience and I am not disappointed. Plus it seems to be run by women...yaaayy we women rock.

Name: Shiki

Review Text: It was an amazing surprise. We got there with our kids because they were hungry. It's a quiet place,  the service was great and the food too. I strongly recommend to go to this restaurant.
